entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 1:30 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: ENE 30 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
